name: LUMEN TECHNOLOGIES, INC. (FORMERLY CENTURYLINK, INC.)
sampleDescriptions: Congressional oversight of Connect America Fund; application of Congressional Review Act to FCC's Restoring Internet Freedom Rule; use of predictive analytic technologies help prevent abuse of opioids; H.R.4747 -- Defending U.S. Government Communications Act; implementation of federal tax reform as applied to base erosion; and cybersecurity protection for federal government IT systems; transition of federal agencies to GSA's Enterprise Infrastructure Services contract for communications and IT services.

H.R.2 -- Agricultural Improvement Act (provisions related to Rural Utilities Service broadband programs); and
H.R.4747 - Defending US Government Communications Act, as well as related provisions in H.R.1515, the John S McCain National Defense Authorization Act for FY 2019 (NDAA).

General lobbying on the following issues:
Congressional Oversight of the Connect America Fund;
Congressional Review Act, as applied to the FCCs Restoring Internet Freedom Rule; and
Use of predictive analytics technology to discourage prescription opioid abuse.

General lobbying on the following issues:
Cybersecurity protection for federal government IT systems; and
Transition of federal agencies to GSA's Enterprise Infrastructure Services (EIS)  contract for communications and IT services.

General lobbying on the following issues:
Cybersecurity protection for federal government IT systems; and
Transition of federal agencies to GSA's Enterprise Infrastructure Services (EIS) contract.

General lobbying on the following issues:
Cybersecurity protection for federal government IT systems, including changes to the Trusted Internet Connection program; and
Transition of federal agencies to GSA's Enterprise Infrastructure Services (EIS) contract.

S.1032 - RURAL Act (on provisions related to high pole attachment rates).

General lobbying on Federal taxation of rural telephone exchange sales.

General lobbying on the following issues:

Cybersecurity protection for federal government IT systems, including changes to the Trusted Internet Connection program; 
Federal support for election security; and
Transition of federal agencies to GSA's Enterprise Infrastructure Services (EIS) contract.

General lobbying on the following issues:

Transition of federal agencies to the GSA Enterprise Infrastructure Services (EIS) contract; and Cybersecurity protections for federal IT systems.

Lobbying on the following bill:

H.R. 5240, a bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the look-thru rule for related controlled foreign corporations permanent.

General lobbying on Federal taxation of rural telephone exchange sales.

General lobbying on the following issues:

Transition of federal agencies to the GSA Enterprise Infrastructure Services (EIS) contract;
Cybersecurity protections for federal IT systems; and 
5G testbed provisions of the National Defense Authorization Act.

General lobbying on the following issues:

Cybersecurity protections for federal IT systems; and 
5G testbed provisions of the National Defense Authorization Act.

General lobbying on the following issues: broadband infrastructure issues; distance learning, broadband investment provisions of the American Rescue Plan; Implementation of low-income broadband programs from Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2020.

Specific lobbying on the following bills:

H.R.1783/S.745 - Accessible Affordable Internet for All Act;
H.R.1848 - Leading Infrastructure for Tomorrows America (LIFT) Act; and
S.922 - Eliminate the Digital Divide Act of 2020.
